name: Designership Design System v.1.3 - FREE Version
description:
Since I formed my very first design agency back in 2014, I realised the importance of having a scalable and re-usable design system. The only way we were able to run 5-10 projects in parallel was a well managed design system.


However there are too many design systems on the market that are overly bloated with unnecessary components that never get used. The Designership Design System has been created and refined to perfection. We have kept it lean but dynamic enough to accomodate for every new project!


Full version contains:


  • 200+ components (THOUSANDS of variations) you will use EVERYDAY
  • 100% Responsive elements with Autolayout
  • 100% Interactive components for better prototypes
  • Light & Dark Mode now available
  • Key focus on core components that will actually use in real projects.
  • And so much more..


Download the full version here
